review: Very user friendly, great selection of apps. Really like that it does not require a device to mirror for use. Only complaints are that the keyboard is inconsistently QWERTY or alphanumeric, text is a little small on my 32in flatscreen, and would LOVE the ability to have a multi app search option for movies and tv shows. Overall, Very satisfied!
